AAh.caption: Content
AAh.doc: The raw content of the file.
AAh.name: content

AAi.caption: File name
AAi.doc: The name of the file, including the extension.
AAi.name: filename

AAj.caption: Download
AAj.doc: If checked, the file will be automatically downloaded after being created.

AAk.caption: Save to Bubble
AAk.doc: If checked, the file will be automatically uploaded to you Bubble database after being created.
